About Me

Get to know me more...

BIO

I am currently in the second year of a four-year sandwich Bachelor's degree at Brunel University studying Computer science

I like spending my time with small projects that could challenge me a little. Additionally, I have other long kept hobbies like playing the drums and new hobbies like learning about how 2D animations and how beginners can start.
